revised_title: The Electrodynamics of Accelerated Motion of Electrified Systems of Finite Extent
tldr: The author investigates the electrodynamics of accelerated motion of electrified systems of finite extent, focusing on charged conducting spheres. They analyze the equations of motion and radiation, considering both steady and variable motion. The study provides insights into the relationship between the motion of charged particles and the surrounding aether, and the conditions required for the establishment of motion.
